forward.bonus: Your attacks: +1d; Enemy close attacks vs you: +1d

defensive.bonus: Enemy close attacks vs you: -1d; Your attacks: -1d per engaged foe

rearward.bonus: Ranged only; Only targeted by ranged attackers

skirmish.bonus: Ranged only; Your ranged attacks: -1d; Enemy melee attacks vs you: -1d

status.poisoned: Cannot rest; roll for Endurance loss daily.
status.wounded: Risk knockout; recover 0 Endurance on short rest; recover STRENGTH Endurance on prolonged rest.
